text: How to get line count cheaply in Python?
I need to get a line count of a large file (hundreds of thousands of lines) in python.
What is the most efficient way both memory- and time-wise?

code:
def file_len(fname):
    with open(fname) as f:
        for i, l in enumerate(f):
            pass
    return i + 1

text: is it possible to do any better?
